name: Dehya
storytext: The eyes of a vulture, the spirit of a lion, an unbridled daughter of the desert.
source: Reward for inviting Dehya to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Molten Inferno
skills.descriptionraw: Summon <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113093]</color>. If $[C113093] already exists, then first deal $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT].
skills.descriptionreplaced: Summon <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fiery Sanctum Field</color>. If Fiery Sanctum Field already exists, then first deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>.
skills.description: Summon Fiery Sanctum Field. If Fiery Sanctum Field already exists, then first deal 1 Pyro DMG.

skills.name: Leonine Bite
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>, then performs "<color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>" for <color=#FFFFFFFF>Incineration Drive</color>.
skills.description: Deals 3 Pyro DMG, then performs "Prepare Skill" for Incineration Drive.
